name: Sundarbans Adventure Tour
aboutTour: Explore the largest mangrove forest in the world, home to the Royal Bengal Tiger. This tour will take you deep into the heart of the Sundarbans, where you will witness breathtaking wildlife, serene rivers, and stunning landscapes.
highlights: Boat ride through the Sundarbans rivers
Watch wildlife including crocodiles, deer, and birds
Explore local villages and culture
Visit the famous Kotka Beach

itinerary.description: Depart from Khulna early morning and head to Sundarbans by boat. Visit the wildlife sanctuary and enjoy a boat safari through the mangroves.
Full day wildlife exploration with a visit to Kotka Beach, a popular spot for wildlife sightings and stunning views.
Morning nature walk, followed by a village visit. Return to Khulna by boat in the afternoon.

name: Cox’s Bazar Beach Tour
aboutTour: Cox’s Bazar, the longest natural sea beach in the world, is a perfect getaway for those looking to relax by the sea. Enjoy breathtaking sunsets, seafood delicacies, and leisurely walks along the beach.
highlights: Relax on the world’s longest beach
Visit Himchari Waterfall and Inani Beach
Enjoy fresh seafood at local restaurants
Witness a stunning sunset over the Bay of Bengal
included: Guided tours to Himchari and Inani Beach

itinerary.description: Arrive at Cox’s Bazar, check into hotel, and enjoy a beach walk in the afternoon. Evening seafood dinner by the beach.
After breakfast, visit Himchari Waterfall and Inani Beach. Depart for Dhaka in the evening.

name: Srimangal Tea Garden Tour
aboutTour: Explore the lush green tea estates of Srimangal, known as the tea capital of Bangladesh. This tour offers a perfect combination of nature and culture, where you can enjoy the scenic beauty of rolling tea gardens and taste the famous seven-layer tea.
highlights: Walk through lush tea gardens
Taste the iconic seven-layer tea
Visit Lawachara National Park
Experience the culture of the Khasi ethnic group
included: Tea estate tour with a guide

itinerary.description: Arrive in Srimangal, visit a local tea estate, and enjoy a seven-layer tea. Evening visit to Lawachara National Park.
Morning nature walk, followed by a visit to a local Khasi village. Depart for Dhaka in the afternoon.

name: Bandarban Hill Trekking Tour
aboutTour: Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the Chittagong Hill Tracts as you trek through Bandarban’s rugged hills, waterfalls, and indigenous villages. This tour is ideal for adventure seekers looking to explore off-the-beaten-path destinations.
highlights: Trek to Nilgiri Hills and Nafakhum Waterfall
Visit indigenous Marma and Chakma villages
Enjoy scenic boat rides on the Sangu River
Watch the sunrise from Tiger Hill

itinerary.description: Arrival in Bandarban, visit local Marma villages and explore the surroundings. Overnight stay in eco-lodges.
Full-day trek to Nilgiri Hills, enjoy stunning views and explore nearby villages.
Trek to Nafakhum Waterfall, enjoy lunch by the waterfall and return to the lodge in the evening.
Early morning trek to Tiger Hill to watch the sunrise, followed by a visit to the Sangu River. Depart for Dhaka.

name: Dhaka Historical Landmarks Tour
aboutTour: Discover the rich history of Dhaka, the capital of Bangladesh, on a full-day tour that covers its most famous landmarks and hidden gems. From Mughal architecture to modern cultural landmarks, this tour offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and city life.
highlights: Visit Lalbagh Fort and Ahsan Manzil
Explore the Dhakeshwari Temple and Armenian Church
Rickshaw ride through Old Dhaka
Cruise on the Buriganga River

itinerary.description: Begin the day with a visit to Lalbagh Fort, followed by a tour of Ahsan Manzil and the bustling streets of Old Dhaka. After lunch, explore Dhakeshwari Temple and the Armenian Church before ending the day with a river cruise on the Buriganga.

name: Rangamati Lake Tour
aboutTour: Explore the peaceful beauty of Kaptai Lake and the surrounding hills of Rangamati. Known for its serene waters, tribal culture, and lush landscapes, this tour offers a perfect escape into nature and local culture.
highlights: Boat ride on Kaptai Lake
Visit Chakma and Tripura villages
Explore Buddhist temples and tribal markets
Hiking through scenic forest trails
excluded: Tips for guides and boat crew

itinerary.description: Arrive in Rangamati and embark on a scenic boat ride on Kaptai Lake. Visit local tribal villages and learn about their culture.
Full day of exploration with a visit to tribal markets, local temples, and a hike through the forest to a scenic viewpoint.
Morning boat ride, followed by a visit to local handicraft markets. Return to Dhaka in the evening.

name: Khulna City Cultural Tour
aboutTour: Experience the vibrant culture of Khulna, known for its rich history and diverse communities. This tour takes you through historic sites, local markets, and cultural landmarks.
highlights: Visit Sixty Dome Mosque
Explore the local fish market
Walk through the ancient ruins of Bagerhat
Taste traditional Khulna cuisine

itinerary.description: Start your day with a visit to the Sixty Dome Mosque, followed by exploring the vibrant local fish market. Enjoy lunch featuring traditional Khulna cuisine before visiting the ancient ruins of Bagerhat.

name: Sundarbans Mangrove Forest Tour
aboutTour: Experience the unique ecosystem of the Sundarbans, the largest mangrove forest in the world and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. This tour is ideal for wildlife enthusiasts and nature lovers.
highlights: Wildlife spotting including Bengal tigers
Boat safari through the mangrove forests
Visit to local fishing villages
Explore the rich biodiversity of the area

itinerary.description: Arrive in Khulna, transfer to the boat and begin your journey into the Sundarbans. Enjoy a boat safari and spot wildlife.
Full-day exploration of the Sundarbans, visiting various islands, and fishing villages. Enjoy the scenery and biodiversity.
Morning boat ride for wildlife spotting before heading back to Khulna. Depart for Dhaka in the evening.
